DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to detect adverse drug reactions for long-term use (particularly clinically significant adverse drug reactions) occurring in clinical settings, to examine factors likely to affect the safety and efficacy in the Japanese asthma patients who are treated with fluticasone propionate/salmeterol xinafoate.
DOC.brief_title: Special Drug Use Investigation for ADOAIR (Fluticasone/Salmeterol)
DOC.mesh_term: Fluticasone Propionate, Salmeterol Xinafoate Drug Combination
DOC.criteria: Must use fluticasone and salmeterol for the first time Must use fluticasone and salmeterol for longterm Patients with hypersensitivity to salmeterol and fluticasone Patients with infection which salmeterol and fluticasone is not effective Patients with deep mycosis
